synopsis.text:
Miracle Dreamy Kingdom's queen has a special offer for Yume, a lively and optimistic first-year junior high school student: collect Dreamy Stones, and she'll grant Yume one wish. All of this begins when Yume stumbles upon Mew, a talking pastel violet kitten plush that has mysteriously fallen from the sky. With Mew's extraordinary 'Dream Synchro' ability, they can enter and explore dreams together, collecting the precious Dreamy Stones along the way.

As Yume and Mew embark on their dream world adventures, they forge new friendships and share countless experiences. By day, Yume enjoys her school life, and by night, she delves into the enchanting world of dreams with her newfound partner, Mew. This delightful anime, "Mewkledreamy," invites you to join Yume and Mew on their whimsical journey filled with dreams, friendships, and the pursuit of a heartfelt wish.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
